byline.original: By AL BAKER and ROB HARRIS

abstract: One Police Plaza: An officer receives a new job after a pepper-spray encounter; and the proper behavior of an undercover officer is at issue in the Sean Bell police hearing.
snippet: One Police Plaza: An officer receives a new job after a pepper-spray encounter; and the proper behavior of an undercover officer is at issue in the Sean Bell police hearing.
lead_paragraph: When imperfect police officers are caught and punished, they sometimes receive a form of discipline known colloquially behind the Blue Wall of Silence as "highway therapy."
